desc: Enjoy a memorable mountain vacation at Kasol. You will love trekking, camping, festivals and parties. Kasol is also very popular among relaxation-seekers.
Lansdowne is the perfect getaway for mountain lovers. You can expect intense cold weather with sub zero temperatures. Don't forget to spend some time relaxing at Lansdowne.

subText: A Little Paradise in Himachal Pradesh
desc: Prepare to be wooed by the mesmerizing mountains of Leh. You will love sightseeing and the surreal vistas of snow-capped mountains. Leh is also known for its unique wildlife.

subText: Hub of Natural Bounties and Winter Sports
desc: Let the mighty mountains of Shimla raise your spirits! You will love sightseeing, paragliding, hiking, camping, and trekking. Shimla is also an ideal destination for a relaxing break.
Enjoy a memorable mountain vacation at Wayanad. You can expect hot afternoons and pleasant evenings. You can also enjoy the various adventure activities at Wayanad.
Prepare to be wooed by the mesmerizing mountains of Leh. You will love sightseeing and the surreal vistas of snow-capped mountains. Leh is also known for its unique wildlife.

subText: The Base Camp for Amarnath Yatra
desc: For the best mountain views, head to Pahalgam. You will love soaking in lush green surroundings and exploring the various trekking trails. Pahalgam is also an ideal destination for a relaxing break.

subText: Heaven in the White Hills of Kashmir
desc: If mountains make you feel alive, then head to Gulmarg. You can expect the temperatures drop down to below freezing. Gulmarg is also very popular among relaxation-seekers.

subText: A Serene Hill Station in Tamil Nadu
desc: If crisp air and altitude feel like home, then the mountains of Coonoor are calling! You will love trekking and sightseeing. Coonoor is also an ideal destination for a relaxing break.
Prepare to be wooed by the mesmerizing mountains of Lavasa. You will love sightseeing and picnicking. Lavasa is also very popular among relaxation-seekers.

For the best mountain views, head to Ananthagiri. You will love indulging in adventure activities, spotting birds and animals, and the mesmerizing greenery. Ananthagiri also offers a wide range of adventure activities.
